name: Robert Lamont LLOYD, petitioner, v. UNITED STATES.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
Robert Lamont LLOYD, petitioner,
v.
UNITED STATES.
attorneys: On petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit. Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis and petition for writ of certiorari granted. Judgment vacated, and case remanded to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit in light of the position asserted by the Solicitor General in his brief for the United States filed on December 20, 2017.
casebody.head_matter:
Robert Lamont LLOYD, petitioner,
v.
UNITED STATES.
No. 17-6297.
Supreme Court of the United States
Jan. 22, 2018.
On petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit. Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis and petition for writ of certiorari granted. Judgment vacated, and case remanded to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit in light of the position asserted by the Solicitor General in his brief for the United States filed on December 20, 2017.
